description.value:
Identifies the type of verification investigation being undertaken with respect to the subject of the verification activity.
**Examples:**
1. Verification of eligibility for coverage under a policy or program - aka enrolled/covered by a policy or program 2. Verification of record - e.g., person has record in an immunization registry 3. Verification of enumeration - e.g. NPI 4. Verification of Board Certification - provider specific 5. Verification of Certification - e.g. JAHCO, NCQA, URAC 6. Verification of Conformance - e.g. entity use with HIPAA, conformant to the CCHIT EHR system criteria 7. Verification of Provider Credentials 8. Verification of no adverse findings - e.g. on National Provider Data Bank, Health Integrity Protection Data Base (HIPDB)
